_header: I sin each day and nought repent me
_description: The soul of the damned nun speaks to her sister — three lines

BLAdd11579.Transcription:
I senege ilch dai and nought repente medrede of ded de trubel
                    mefor in helle nis no pite
BLAdd11579.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.393.
